Module com.pld.agile
Package com.pld.agile.utils.view

Class MouseClickNotDragDetector

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.utils.view.MouseClickNotDragDetector
public class MouseClickNotDragDetector extends Object
Event Handling object allowing to set a listener for a click that is not followed by a drag.
